languages.text: {n}Внимательно изучив устройство, Паскаль едко изрекает:{/n} "Это не ты сделал. Я вижу в сем механизме элементы конструкции гораздо более сложные, чем твой разум способен постичь. Ты за кем-то подсматривал и копировал".

{n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."
languages.original_text: {n}Внимательно изучив устройство, Паскаль едко изрекает:{/n} "Это не ты сделал. Я вижу в сем механизме элементы конструкции гораздо более сложные, чем твой разум способен постичь. Ты за кем-то подсматривал и копировал".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après un examen minutieux de l'appareil, Pasqal demande d'un ton acerbe :{/n}« Ce n'est pas votre œuvre, n'est-ce pas ? Je distingue dans ce mécanisme des éléments structurels bien plus complexes que ce que votre esprit est capable de concevoir. Vous avez observé quelqu'un et avez imité son travail. »
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un examen minutieux de l'appareil, Pasqal demande d'un ton acerbe :{/n}« Ce n'est pas votre œuvre, n'est-ce pas ? Je distingue dans ce mécanisme des éléments structurels bien plus complexes que ce que votre esprit est capable de concevoir. Vous avez observé quelqu'un et avez imité son travail. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡仔细检查着这件装置，之后以尖刻的声音开了口。{/n}“这东西不是你设计出来的，没错吧？在这台机器中，我看到了极其复杂的结构元素，完全超乎你的想象能力。你之前见过别人制作这样的机器，之后把看到的东西生搬硬套，抄了过来。”
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡仔细检查着这件装置，之后以尖刻的声音开了口。{/n}“这东西不是你设计出来的，没错吧？在这台机器中，我看到了极其复杂的结构元素，完全超乎你的想象能力。你之前见过别人制作这样的机器，之后把看到的东西生搬硬套，抄了过来。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}装置を入念に調べたあと、パスカルは辛辣に言った。{/n}「これを作ったのはあなたではないな？この機構には、あなたの頭では理解できないほど洗練された構造要素がある。あなたは誰かが作っているのを観察したうえで、その仕事を真似たのだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."

traits.locale_text: {n}装置を入念に調べたあと、パスカルは辛辣に言った。{/n}「これを作ったのはあなたではないな？この機構には、あなたの頭では理解できないほど洗練された構造要素がある。あなたは誰かが作っているのを観察したうえで、その仕事を真似たのだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nachdem Pasqal das Gerät sorgfältig untersucht hat, sagt er angesäuert:{/n} "Das ist nicht Euer Werk, oder? Der Mechanismus hat bestimmte Strukturelemente, die für Euren Verstand einfach zu raffiniert sind. Ihr habt gesehen, wie ihn jemand aufgebaut hat und dann dessen Arbeit kopiert."
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem Pasqal das Gerät sorgfältig untersucht hat, sagt er angesäuert:{/n} "Das ist nicht Euer Werk, oder? Der Mechanismus hat bestimmte Strukturelemente, die für Euren Verstand einfach zu raffiniert sind. Ihr habt gesehen, wie ihn jemand aufgebaut hat und dann dessen Arbeit kopiert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras examinar detenidamente el dispositivo, Pasqal adopta un tono mordaz.{/n} «Esto no lo has hecho tú, ¿verdad? En este mecanismo estoy viendo elementos estructurales más sofisticados de lo que tu mente es capaz de comprender. Has visto a alguien haciéndolo y has copiado su trabajo».
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras examinar detenidamente el dispositivo, Pasqal adopta un tono mordaz.{/n} «Esto no lo has hecho tú, ¿verdad? En este mecanismo estoy viendo elementos estructurales más sofisticados de lo que tu mente es capaz de comprender. Has visto a alguien haciéndolo y has copiado su trabajo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, cihazı dikkatle inceledikten sonra iğneleyici bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bunu sen yapmadın, değil mi? Mekanizmada senin zihninin algı kapasitesinin çok ötesindeki bazı sofistike yapısal elementler görüyorum. Böyle bir şey yapan birini gözlemlemiş, taklit etmişsin."
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully examining the device, Pasqal says acerbically,{/n} "You did not make this, did you? I see more sophisticated structural elements in this mechanism than your mind is ever capable of fathoming. You observed someone do it and copied their work."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal cihazı dikkatle inceledikten sonra iğneleyici bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Bunu sen yapmadın, değil mi? Mekanizmada senin zihninin algı kapasitesinin çok ötesindeki bazı sofistike yapısal elementler görüyorum. Böyle bir şey yapan birini gözlemlemişsin ve onu taklit etmişsin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
